Title: Native Forward Student Access Funding 2025-2026
Short description: Native Forward Scholars Fund recognizes the limited access American Indian and Alaska Native students have regarding graduate entrance and professional examinations.
Full description: Native Forward offers the Student Access Funding to help cover the cost of a student’s graduate or professional examination as well as related preparatory expenses.
Eligibility requirements: Provide a copy of their most-recent, cumulative transcript.
Be an enrolled member or descendant of a federally or state-recognized Tribe.
Provide proof of Tribal enrollment via a copy of their Certificate Degree of Indian Blood, Tribal membership card, OR a letter of enrollment/descendancy from their Tribal enrollment office.
Submit a receipt of payment and copy of test score to Native Forward.
